section.title: Get Services
section.para: Get Services section specifies Client ability to retrieve list of services with using GetServices operation.

section.title: Feature Level Requirement:
section.para: Check Condition based on Device Features: GetServices is supported by Device.

listitem.para: Client connects to Device to retrieve a services using GetServices commad.

Client is considered as supporting Get Services if the following conditions are met:
Client supports Capabilities_GetServicesRequest feature (please see section).

Client is considered as NOT supporting Get Services if ANY of the following is TRUE:
Client does not support Capabilities_GetServicesRequest feature (please see section).
